_comment: This file contains responses only for part-time program. Can be modified for further changes.

patterns: Who will give the welcome speech?
What happens in the welcome speech?
Where is the welcome speech held?
What time is the welcome speech?
responses:
The Welcome Speech and Academic Briefing will be held on **16 January 2025**, from **07:00 PM to 08:30 PM** at **Block C, James Cook University Singapore**. 

**Welcome Speech Schedule:**
07:00 PM – 07:10 PM: Welcome Speech by Deputy Vice-Chancellor, Singapore
07:10 PM – 07:20 PM: Welcome Speech by Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement
07:20 PM – 07:25 PM: JCU 101, followed by breakout room sessions

**Applicable Courses:**
Part-Time Diploma of Higher Education (Psychological Science)
Part-Time Bachelor of Psychological Science
Part-Time Master of Guidance and Counselling
Part-Time Business Programs

**Academic Briefing:**
07:25 PM – 08:30 PM: Academic Advising by Associate Professor, Counselling
07:25 PM – 08:30 PM: Academic Advising by Academic Head, Social and Health Sciences
07:25 PM – 08:30 PM: Academic Advising by Academic Head, Business

Let’s get you started and better prepared for your academic program!

patterns: Who will conduct the academic briefing?
responses: For part-time students, academic advising takes place on 16 January 2025, from 07:25 PM to 08:30 PM. It will be conducted by Associate Professors and Academic Heads based on your course.
For full-time students, academic advising is on 16 January 2025, from 10:40 AM to 11:40 AM in breakout rooms.
